ygData.subject: Re: Weapon Damage [was: L50 (Spoilers)]
ygData.msgSnippet: O.K. i m only tell you guys this because your bards, the cracked darkwood shield is found in high hold pass of a named gnoll, one of the two mucktails.  One
ygData.messageBody:
O.K. i'm only tell you guys this because your bards,
the cracked darkwood shield is found in high hold pass
of a named gnoll, one of the two mucktails. One
mucktail carries this shield, the other carries a
polished granite tomahawk. Both only spawn about
every 4-6 hours. If you enter the pass from the west,
it's the first up ramp on your right. If your on E
Marr and need help tell me. By the way, it took 4
level 16-18 to take him down, as he usally is accom.
by at least 2 flame paws.
